resources.string: If you sign in via Facebook, this application may need the following user permissions:

string.name: perms_dialog_list_of_perms
string.p: - user_posts - displays user`s posts as event, with picture of event, description and details of event;\n\n
- user_events - displays events of users or groups with picture of event, description of event and details ass time, place etc;\n\n
- user_photos - displays event`s creator photo in EventPageFragment as a detail of event;\n\n
- read_page_mailboxes - this app uses the user's email in firebase.
